Did you read Andrea's piece on Forbes <https://www.forbes.com/sites/andrealoubier/2017/10/12/the-emotional-cost-of-being-a-female-millennial-startup-founder> ? 	

For many of us, we don't see all the inner-workings and diligence that go into building a business and running a company. 

We see products and services online and we decide whether or not we want them. This is a "behind closed doors" peak into what it really is like to start a company like Mailbird <https://www.getmailbird.com/> . 

Here we can learn about the emotional cost of starting and running a business like Mailbird - the tough things that most entrepreneurs and CEO's don't talk about. 

Dive in, to understand what it really takes and what it is really like:
